name: Xplore
description:
Xplore is a randomly generated platformer created as part of 48 hour game dev challenge arranged by Miziziziz. The scope of the challenge was to create a game using Kenney's Platformer Art Deluxe (base pack only) within 48 hours of development time.

In addition to Kenney's pack, this game also makes use of the Swish font by Eric Djengue, and the Free Casual Island Game Loops music pack by Aural Space.

Instructions

Use A and D to move left and right, Spacebar to jump. That's it. The aim is to get from the start of the level to the finish without dying. Avoid the native wildlife, you're not allowed to kill them but they don't have such restrictions about you!
